footer.description: Duchesse d’Afric-Art showcases African art and culture through unique creations and immersive artistic experiences.
footer.newsletter_text: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates and events.

slide1.title: Celebrating Cameroonian Art & Culture
slide1.subtitle: The Akiba Brunch
slide1.description: The Akiba Brunch is more than just a brunch: it’s a stage where local gastronomy, contemporary art, and live music meet. Each edition highlights Cameroonian talent and builds bridges between cultures, in a warm and inspiring atmosphere.

slide2.title: Cultural & Responsible Travels
slide2.subtitle: Duchesse d’Afric-Art
slide2.description: With Duchesse d’Afric-Art, explore Africa differently. Our tours take you to the heart of traditions, crafts, and unique heritage. By valuing local communities and respecting the environment, we turn every journey into a human and authentic experience.

slide3.title: Refined Tastings
slide3.subtitle: Domaines Vinsmoselle
slide3.description: As ambassador of Domaines Vinsmoselle in Cameroon, we organize tastings and events around exceptional wines and crémants. Combining elegance, conviviality, and expertise, each encounter is an immersion in the art of living and sensory pleasure.

slide4.title: Digital Identity & Communication
slide4.subtitle: Mindz Studio
slide4.description: Mindz Studio is your partner in digital strategy and branding. We create strong brand universes, develop engaging content, and deploy campaigns tailored to your ambitions. Our mission: to turn your ideas into memorable digital experiences.

aboutSection.title: A Cultural & Entrepreneurial Vision
aboutSection.description: Duchesse d’Afric-Art is a collective of cultural entrepreneurs and branding experts based in Cameroon. We create experiences that highlight African identity: responsible travels, wine events, cultural gatherings, and digital services.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: We are committed to promoting responsible and authentic tourism in Cameroon and Africa. Our long-term vision is to become a key player in the tourism and events sector in Cameroon by organizing unforgettable experiences such as team-building activities for local businesses, as well as unique tours and cultural events.

servicesSection.title: Our Areas of Expertise
servicesSection.subtitle: Overview of our services and expertise

duchesse.title: Duchesse d’Afric-Art
duchesse.subtitle: Cultural & responsible travel
duchesse.description: Tailor-made itineraries to experience Africa in its authenticity. Themed circuits focused on crafts, heritage, gastronomy, and music.
duchesse.longDescription: Each trip is designed as an immersion. We work with local guides, artisans, and chefs to offer you a human, ethical, and sustainable experience. Whether you are passionate about art, culture, or gastronomy, our circuits will let you discover Africa like never before.
duchesse.quote: “Traveling is meeting yourself through others.” – Duchesse d’Afric-Art

vinsmoselle.title: Domaines Vinsmoselle | Poll – Fabaire Cameroon
vinsmoselle.subtitle: Wine representation & events
vinsmoselle.description: Tastings, branding, and events around quality wines and crémants. Importing, masterclasses, and wine image consulting.
vinsmoselle.longDescription: Our mission is to showcase Luxembourgish and European know-how through exclusive tastings and unique sensory experiences. We support companies, restaurants, and individuals in organizing elegant and memorable events.
vinsmoselle.quote: “Wine is bottled poetry.” – Robert Louis Stevenson

mindz.title: MindzStudio
mindz.subtitle: Digital agency & business strategy
mindz.description: Content creation, branding, and community management. Strong and coherent digital identities.
mindz.longDescription: We combine creativity, strategy, and technology to boost your brand. From graphic design to social media management, we offer comprehensive support to maximize your visibility and sales.
mindz.quote: “A strong brand is not told, it is experienced.” – Mindz Studio

cta.title: Ready to live the experience?
cta.description: Join our events, discover our trips, and grow your brand with our services. A unique adventure awaits you.

missions.title: Our Missions
missions.description: We believe in inclusive cultural, social, and economic development, creating synergies between tradition and modernity.

mission1.title: Promote African culture
mission1.description: We celebrate the richness of African heritage through arts, music, fashion, and gastronomy, to inspire and connect communities.

mission2.title: Create unique experiences
mission2.description: Each event and project is designed to amaze and immerse our participants in memorable and interactive experiences.

mission3.title: Support local communities
mission3.description: We collaborate with local artisans and actors to generate a positive and sustainable impact, highlighting local talents.

visa.title: Explore 8 African destinations differently
visa.description: Duchesse d’Afric-Art Voyages invites you to discover authentic Africa through cultural, responsible and emotional journeys. From Cameroon to South Africa, experience breathtaking landscapes, warm people and unforgettable adventures.

mindzStudio.title: Mindz Studio
mindzStudio.subtitle: – Duchesse d’Afric-Art integrated digital agency
mindzStudio.description: Mindz Studio is Duchesse d’Afric-Art creative and technological agency. We craft impactful digital strategies, engaging content, and innovative web platforms that drive your brand to success.

vinsmoselle.title: Vinsmoselle Estates | Poll – Fabaire Cameroon
vinsmoselle.subtitle: Representation & Wine Events
vinsmoselle.description: Tastings, branding, and events around quality wines and sparkling wines. We support companies, individuals, and institutions with importation, masterclasses, and wine image consulting.
vinsmoselle.dda3: Exclusive distribution by 2FC Corporation SAS (starting November 1st).
vinsmoselle.dda4: Events: tastings, brand activations, collaborations with lounges (BYM, Le Boj, Café de Paris).
vinsmoselle.dda5: Photo gallery: products, events, and promotional materials.

akiba.title: The Akiba Brunch
akiba.subtitle: Signature & Lifestyle Event
akiba.description: The unmissable weekend gathering. Blending gastronomy, art, music, and culture, The Akiba Brunch celebrates local craftsmanship in a refined, convivial atmosphere.
akiba.detail1: Signature event showcasing creativity and local excellence.
akiba.detail2: Objectives: promoting craftsmanship, networking, and premium entertainment.
akiba.detail3: Photo & video gallery from previous editions, featuring highlights and artists.
akiba.detail4: Spotlight on partners, artisans, and emerging talents.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We collaborate with trusted partners who share our vision of excellence and innovation.

franchiseIT.name: Franchise IT
franchiseIT.description: Our exclusive partner in digital strategy and technological innovation. Together, we build sustainable and creative solutions.

boj.name: The Boj Restaurant
boj.description: A renowned restaurant in Douala, Le Boj is a place of flavors, elegance, and conviviality. It celebrates local culinary expertise while offering a unique gastronomic experience in a refined setting.

pari.name: Café de Paris
pari.description: Café de Paris, a culinary gem in Douala, is a place where elegance meets conviviality. Each dish celebrates local expertise, enhanced by refined presentation and a warm atmosphere. Whether for a business lunch, a romantic dinner, or a gathering with friends, Café de Paris offers an unforgettable gastronomic experience, blending authentic flavors with the art of French living.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question, collaboration or idea to share? We'd love to hear from you.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.text1: An unforgettable cultural journey! The Duchesse d’Afric-Art team combined authenticity, human encounters, and professionalism. A deeply enriching experience.
testimonials.text2: Collaboration with the team in Cameroon was of rare quality. The tastings were impeccably organized and the wine presentation simply remarkable.
testimonials.text3: Participating in the Akiba Brunch was a great opportunity to showcase my art and interact with a curious and supportive audience. A real showcase for Cameroonian talent.
testimonials.text4: Mindz Studio helped me redesign my brand identity. Strategy, design, communication: everything was carried out with precision and creativity.
testimonials.text5: A passionate team, attentive, and always proactive. Mindz Studio is a true growth partner for our online presence.

service.bannerTitle: Experiences that enhance African art and culture
service.bannerDescription: Duchesse d’Afric’Art supports artists, brands, and institutions in promoting African heritage through cultural trips, events, brand representation, and tailored digital strategies.

essence.title: Our Essence
essence.subtitle: Creative, authentic, and sustainable Africa
essence.description: Duchesse d’Afric’Art celebrates the artistic richness of the continent through unique projects blending art, design, culture, and innovation. Each initiative supports African talents and promotes local know-how in a responsible and inclusive approach.

akiba.title: The Akiba Brunch
akiba.subtitle: Cultural & artistic brunch
akiba.description: A friendly event that showcases the creative Cameroonian scene. Between cuisine, music, visual arts, and artisan market, each edition brings artists, brands, and the public together in a warm atmosphere.

cotedivoire.description: Ivory Coast enchants with its cultural diversity, dynamic cities, and breathtaking natural landscapes.

cameroun.description: Cameroon offers incredible cultural diversity, stunning landscapes, and rich authentic cuisine.

zanzibar.title: ZANZIBAR
zanzibar.description: Zanzibar captivates with its idyllic beaches, fascinating history, and authentic Swahili culture.

ghana.title: GHANA
ghana.description: Ghana is rich in history, traditions, and cultural festivals, offering an authentic African experience.

rwanda.description: Rwanda is a land of mountains and remarkable cultural and environmental initiatives.

togo.title: TOGO
togo.description: Togo charms with its traditions, music, crafts, and diverse landscapes from beaches to mountains.

about.bannerTitle: The Soul of Contemporary African Art
about.bannerDescription: Duchesse d’Afric’Art, founded by Melissa MBEUSSEUNE, is a vibrant tribute to African creativity. We showcase the artists and craftsmanship of the continent through cultural, immersive, and sustainable experiences.
about.title: Art as a bridge between Africa and the world
about.paragraph1: Duchesse d’Afric’Art is a cultural and artistic house founded by Melissa MBEUSSEUNE, an entrepreneur and brand strategist passionate about showcasing African heritage. Our mission is to create dialogue between cultures through exhibitions, cultural trips, and unique sensory experiences.
about.paragraph2: Every project we undertake is an invitation to explore Africa differently — to discover its artists, artisans, creators, and the deep emotions emanating from their works. Our approach is based on authenticity, sustainability, and respect for cultural roots.
about.founderIntro: Consultant, CEO, and Brand Strategist based in Douala, Melissa MBEUSSEUNE is an inspiring figure of the new generation of African entrepreneurs. She works at the crossroads of culture, commerce, and brand strategy.
roles: Cameroon Representative — Domaines Vinsmoselle | Poll – Fabair Cameroun
Promoter — The Akiba Brunch, a cultural and artistic brunch
Director — Mindz Studio, digital & business strategy agency
about.founderConclusion: Through her projects, Melissa works for a modern, confident, and radiant Africa. She believes in the power of storytelling, branding, and creative collaboration to transform the perception of the continent.

banner.description: Let’s connect — your projects, our talents

perspectivesAvenir.title: Future Perspectives
perspectivesAvenir.subtitle: Cameroon and beyond
perspectivesAvenir.description: In 2025 and beyond, we plan to expand our offerings with more diverse tours in several African countries, while also strengthening our presence in Cameroon by offering:
points: Local discovery stays for a day or a weekend, making these experiences accessible to all budgets.
An extended team-building program for companies wishing to organize tailor-made events.

finalText.part1: We will also continue to organize the
finalText.part2: several times a year to energize professional and cultural meetings in a friendly and relaxed setting.

akibaSection.title: Cultural & Artistic Brunch
akibaSection.subtitle: A friendly event showcasing Cameroon's creative scene, including cuisine, music, and artisan markets.
akibaSection.description: The Akiba Brunch is more than a meal: it's a sensory and artistic experience. We highlight local artists, artisans, and chefs to offer a unique moment of sharing and discovery.
akibaSection.quote: "Where art meets conviviality, the soul of Cameroon expresses itself."

mindzStudi.description: Mindz Studio is the creative and technological agency of Duchesse d’Afric-Art. We design high-performance digital strategies, engaging content, and innovative web platforms that drive your brand to success.

whyUs.title: Why choose Mindz Studio?
whyUs.description: Our team guides you in creating unique digital experiences, combining creativity, technology, and performance. Discover what makes us stand out.
reasons: Creation of engaging and innovative content

servicesList.title: Content Creation
servicesList.desc: Design of visual and written content tailored to your audience and objectives.

servicesList.title: Web Development
servicesList.desc: Websites, applications, and professional messaging for a high-performing digital presence.

cta.title: Ready to elevate your brand?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today to bring your digital projects to life.

mindz.sectionDesc: Every service we provide is designed as a strategic lever to elevate your brand toward digital success. Our approach is based on performance, creativity, and a deep understanding of digital behaviors.

services.title: Content Creation & Community Management
services.description:
At Mindz Studio, we believe that content is the soul of a brand. Our teams design powerful editorial strategies that evoke emotion, strengthen the connection with your audience, and amplify the reach of your message across every platform.

From brand storytelling to the daily management of your social networks, we build a strong and engaging digital identity supported by flawless visual and editorial consistency.
advantages: Tailor-made visual and written content creation.
Smart animation and moderation of your communities.
Performance analysis and continuous strategy improvement.
Creative digital campaigns to boost engagement.
Development of an editorial line aligned with your brand values.

services.title: Web Development & Digital Solutions
services.description:
We design modern, immersive, and high-performing websites and digital platforms. Each project combines design, fluidity, and technology to deliver an intuitive and impactful user experience.

Our solutions go far beyond a simple showcase website — we build powerful and scalable digital ecosystems integrating professional messaging, SEO, and data security.
advantages: Custom showcase sites, e-commerce platforms, and web portals.
High performance, accessibility, and multi-device compatibility.
Integration of secure professional email systems.
Technical optimization and SEO built-in from conception.
Reliable hosting and scalable maintenance services.

services.title: Tailor-Made Digital & Business Strategy
services.description:
Every business has its own story and unique potential. We analyze your positioning, objectives, and market to build a coherent and high-performing digital and business strategy.

Our approach is rooted in data, creativity, and strategic vision. We support you from planning to execution, continuously measuring results to fine-tune your growth.
advantages: Comprehensive audit of your digital presence and market position.
Development of a 360° marketing strategy tailored to your goals.
Targeted multi-channel campaigns (social media, email, ads, SEO…).
Implementation of performance dashboards and KPIs.
Continuous support and agile optimization for sustainable growth.

services.title: SEO & Digital Performance Optimization
services.description:
Your online visibility is not optional — it’s essential. We optimize your natural referencing so that your brand can be found, recognized, and chosen.

Our SEO experts work on your site’s structure, content, and technical performance to sustainably improve your Google ranking and attract qualified traffic.
advantages: Comprehensive SEO audit and technical recommendations.
Keyword optimization and high-quality content improvement.
Enhancement of site speed and user experience.
Long-term link building and content strategy.
Regular performance monitoring and continuous adjustments.

mindzPourquoi.title: Why Choose Mindz Studio?
mindzPourquoi.description: We don’t just do digital — we build relationships, emotions, and strategies. Mindz Studio represents the perfect balance between creativity, precision, and vision.

avantages.title: Human & Creative Approach
avantages.text: Every project begins with a deep understanding of your needs and values. We create digital experiences that connect brands to their audiences with authenticity and emotion.

avantages.title: Performance & Innovation
avantages.text: We combine creativity, data, and technology to design digital solutions that are effective, measurable, and sustainable. Innovation isn’t a word to us — it’s our daily mindset.

avantages.title: Multisector Expertise
avantages.text: From culture to commerce, education to technology, our team adapts to every environment. We transform your ideas into tailor-made digital strategies.

mindzObjectif.title: Our Vision & Mission
mindzObjectif.description: Mindz Studio aims to build a powerful African digital ecosystem where local brands can compete with international standards. We believe in technology serving people, and innovation serving purpose.

list.text: Showcase African creativity on a global scale.
Support businesses in their digital transformation.
Create intuitive, aesthetic, and high-performing web experiences.

steps.title: 1. Analysis & Strategy
steps.text: We begin each project with a deep understanding of your vision, goals, and target audience.

steps.title: 2. Design & Concept
steps.text: Our designers translate your identity into immersive and consistent visual experiences.

steps.title: 3. Development & Integration
steps.text: Our developers bring your projects to life with precision, performance, and security.

steps.title: 4. Launch & Support
steps.text: We handle the launch, monitoring, and continuous improvement of your digital solutions.

items.title: Human Creativity

items.title: Excellence & Precision

mindzCTA.subtitle: Let's discuss your vision and bring it to life through creativity, technology, and excellence.

sparkling.description: Our ambition is to elevate the art of wine in Africa by creating a bridge between European winemaking traditions and Africa’s cultural richness. Every experience we offer is meant to be sensory, educational, and deeply human.

obj1.titre: Promoting the Art of European Wine
obj1.texte: Providing a showcase of excellence for wines and sparkling wines from Luxembourg and Europe through exclusive tastings and prestigious experiences.

obj2.texte: Bringing together African gastronomy and European winemaking traditions in a refined setting that honors the origins of each.

obj3.texte: Offering masterclasses, training, and sensory workshops to introduce the public to oenological culture—from the vineyard to the table.

sparkling.imageTexte: Events where refinement, sharing, and emotion meet.
sparkling.visionTexte1: We believe in a responsible art of living, where every glass tells a story — one of terroir, craftsmanship, and human connection.
sparkling.visionTexte2: Our events are designed to awaken the senses, nourish the mind, and celebrate the beauty of sharing in a world of prestige and authenticity.

perspectives.description: Duchesse d’Afric-Art Sparkling pursues a clear vision: to build a cultural and sensory bridge between Africa and Europe through wine, art, and elegance. Our ambitions reflect a sustainable, inclusive approach filled with genuine emotions.
perspectives.visionTexte: We aim to expand our influence throughout Central and West Africa by creating unique experiences around wine and gastronomy. The goal is to establish the Poll-Fabaire brand within major events, hotels, and institutions across the continent.
perspectives.point1: Development of a network of wine ambassadors
perspectives.point2: Creation of cultural programs around wine and art
perspectives.point3: Strategic partnerships with local chefs and artisans
perspectives.citation: “The future of African wine is not measured in bottles sold, but in emotions shared.”

sparklingExperience.title: The Sensory Experience of Wine
sparklingExperience.description: Each tasting is a journey through aromas, textures, and emotions.

sectors.title: Explore the Art of Living
sectors.subtitle: Travel, wine, digital and culture united for an immersive experience.

ddaSparkling.title: Introduction to
ddaSparkling.intro: Welcome to DDA Sparkling, the exclusive representative of the Luxembourgish house Domaine Vinsmoselle in Cameroon. Our mission is to select the finest wines and sparkling wines to satisfy the most demanding consumers, wholesalers, and prestigious establishments.
ddaSparkling.collection: We are proud to offer you an exclusive collection of Poll-Fabaire sparkling wines, combining elegance, finesse, and European craftsmanship.
ddaSparkling.aboutText1: Founded in 1921, Poll-Fabaire is renowned for the exceptional quality of its sparkling wines, made from the finest Luxembourgish grape varieties. Their expertise and traditional method craftsmanship give their cuvées a unique finesse and complexity.
ddaSparkling.aboutText2: Poll-Fabaire sparkling wines are recognized for their elegance, freshness, and distinctive character, offering an unforgettable experience with every tasting.

sparklingGallery.title: Duchesse d’Afric-Art Sparkling Selection Catalog
sparklingGallery.subtitle: Explore our refined collection showcasing the art of celebration, taste, and elegance through our sparkling creations.

ddaVoyagesIntro.title: Welcome to Duchesse d’Afric-Art Voyages
ddaVoyagesIntro.subtitle: Your partner for unique travel experiences in Africa and beyond.
ddaVoyagesIntro.description: We help you explore exceptional destinations with personalized services and local expertise.

akibaWelcome.title: Welcome to Akiba Brunch
akibaWelcome.subtitle: Experience an immersive journey of gastronomy, culture, and networking.
akibaWelcome.description: Share unforgettable moments, discover new flavors, and connect with art and culture enthusiasts.

akibaBrunch.title: The Akiba Brunch
akibaBrunch.subtitle: A unique moment of gastronomy and culture
akibaBrunch.description: Experience memorable moments around food, music, and art in a friendly environment.
